name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Java AWS Cloud Engineer
professional_summary: Expert Java developer with 6+ years of experience in software development, specializing in sophisticated architectural builds and technology initiatives.
Proficient in AWS cloud services, with a focus on building scalable and secure cloud-based applications.
Strong communication and organization skills, with experience working in agile development environments.
Passionate about staying up-to-date with the latest technology trends and advancements.
Collaborative team player with a proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions.
Utilized Java to build a cloud-based application that improved customer engagement by 25%.
Deployed a microservices architecture on AWS, reducing latency by 30% and improving system reliability.
Engineered a data pipeline using AWS Glue and Apache Beam, increasing data processing efficiency by 40%.
Developed a scalable and secure REST API using Java and Spring Boot, with a focus on cloud-native design principles.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement a cloud-based infrastructure, resulting in a 20% reduction in costs.
Designed and implemented a data warehousing solution using Amazon Redshift, providing real-time insights and analytics.
Utilized AWS Lambda to build a real-time event-driven system, reducing response times by 50%.
Worked closely with the DevOps team to implement a continuous integration and delivery pipeline, improving deployment efficiency by 30%.
Developed a cloud-agnostic data integration solution using Apache NiFi, enabling seamless data exchange between on-prem and cloud-based systems.
Engineered a cloud-based chatbot using Amazon Lex and API Gateway, improving customer support efficiency by 25%.
Collaborated with the QA team to implement a comprehensive testing framework, ensuring high-quality software releases.
Contributed to the development of a cloud-based machine learning model using Apache Spark and AWS SageMaker, resulting in a 20% improvement in predictive accuracy.
